channel.title: About Me on Silverlake's Succurity Blog

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! My name is Rafael Munoz and I am a lifelong security student. I’ve created this blog to help me document all the cool things I learn in security, as well as share a little bit of my life with you. About This Blog Credit where credit is due so thanks to @kakawait for this beautiful theme you see here. This blog is built using Hugo and is hosted on GitHub.
